name: CandyBar Icon
summary: Learn about .PXICON files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Many different PXICON files are included with the CandyBar installation in the ~/​Library/​Application Support/​CandyBar/​Icons/​ directory.
NOTE: "PX" stands for Pixadex, the software from The Iconfactory that was merged into the CandyBar application. Pixadex icons use the .PIXADEX extension.

description: Icon image used by CandyBar, a program used for customizing icons in the Mac OS X environment; saves multiple images in a single file, each with different resolutions representing the standard icon sizes (i.e., 512x512, 256x256, 128x128, etc.).
